about_the_game:
A set of printable artwork from game for Last Fantasy Hentai fans.
About the fist Character of the game and her level.
Includes details about Miyasato Nakamura, her home and a World map from the series.
The pack includes:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.5Ghz Processor or better
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
